headline: If You Invested $10,000 In Simon Property Stock 10 Years Ago, How Much Would You Have Now?
summary: Simon Property Group (NYSE:SPG) owns, develops and manages premier shopping, dining, entertainment and mixed-use destinations, primarily malls, Premium Outlets, The Mills and International Properties. It is set to report its Q4 2024 earnings on Feb. ...
